hero.body: Full-service production, a global retail network, customer support - and you keep up to 85% of profits.

formats.title: Choose from two formats and three project types.
formats.cassetteBody: Cassettes have always been special to music fans and artists. Whether you are saving a recording of a great concert, or preserving an early demo, thereâ€™s no better way to keep that music close than on cassette tapes.
formats.vinylBody: We know how special pressed records are to you. Our products are built for fans, by fans. We make it easy for artists to press vinyl, so the music you love can keep reaching ears in the most beautiful way.
formats.findFitBody: Choose the best MusicY project type to suit your needs â†“
formats.preOrderBody: Put your music on physical, sooner. Take pre-orders from fans and we'll take care of the rest.
formats.crowdfundingBody: Rally your fans and gather pledges. Press the exact number of records you need, without having to pay anything upfront.
formats.startProjectBody: Just after straight up vinyl pressing or cassette duplication? We do that too. Tell us where and we'll ship in bulk to wherever you need.

services.title: Our Services
services.body: We want you to be able to put all your energy into the creative side of making music. So we created a one-stop shop for everything else.
services.designCustomizationBody: With over 39 colors and over 120,000 variations, control what your record will look like.
services.retailNetworkBody: Get direct access to over 150 of our retail partners across the globe.
services.customerSupportBody: Whether youâ€™re an artist in the middle of product, or a fan with questions about your order; our team is here to help.

community.title: Community
community.subTitle: Join a growing community
community.body: We're build a home for the next generation vinyl lovers and cassette junkies. Get in front of fans, connect with artists, labels and stores.

footer.title: MusicY Studio
footer.subTitle: Make it real with MusicY Studio
footer.body: Design the look and feel of your vinyl and cassette and use the profit calculator to immediately see how much your project will cost, and how much you'll earn.
